definition: handsome/refined/elegant/graceful/superior/show (loanword)/CL:場|场[chang2]/(literary) to grow/to bloom/(of crops) to produce ears

sentences.english: Adds silvery brightness to gray hair and neutralizes brassy tones in all shades.
sentences.chinese: 中和所有顏色秀髮的黃銅色，增加灰髮的光澤。

sentences.english: A daily conditioning shampoo to help protect hair, leaving it soft and manageable.
sentences.chinese: 能有效改善受損髮質，令秀髮回覆柔順。

sentences.english: But there are things that they can do to have healthy hair.
sentences.chinese: 不過她們可以爲擁有一頭健康的秀髮做許多事。

sentences.english: Your hair will radiate with rich, natural-looking color and luminescent shine.
sentences.chinese: 令你的秀髮更加滋潤，健康，散發迷人的色彩和光澤。

sentences.english: The hair with sere shag arranges slippery nature, bring withy arrange slippery beautiful hair.
sentences.chinese: 使蓬鬆乾枯的頭髮順滑自然，帶來柔韌順滑的秀髮。

sentences.english: Frequent usage will have smoother and shinier hair.
sentences.chinese: 洗髮護髮同步進行，經常使用秀髮柔潤更光滑。

sentences.english: My love dances in my beautiful hair.
She finishes off her polished look with sleek hair and bright pink lips.
sentences.chinese: 襯出一頭秀髮和亮粉色雙脣。

sentences.english: They has gorgeous hair down to their waist.
I love fondling your hair and kissing your face.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡撫著妳的秀髮吻著妳的臉。

sentences.english: She had a great big head of curly brown hair.
sentences.chinese: 她是全校最漂亮的姑娘，留着一頭棕色的秀髮。

sentences.english: Her long hair shines, thick, heaving in waves of red and brown.
sentences.chinese: 一頭濃密閃亮的秀髮捲起層層紅棕色的波浪。

sentences.english: For beautiful hair, let a child run his or her fingers through it onca day.
sentences.chinese: 若要有美麗的秀髮，在於每天有孩子的手指穿越它。
另一件則是德拉的秀髮。

sentences.english: Her beautiful hair and figure make a compensation for her ugly face.
sentences.chinese: 她的秀髮和優美的身段彌補了她醜陋的面孔。

sentences.english: As her after the shadow, ferial how be to do baby show to send?
sentences.chinese: 身爲影后的她，平日又是如何打理寶貝秀髮的？

definition: cloth head covering worn by men in ancient times/headscarf (typically worn by women)/kerchief/turban
